title: Ghosts and Reckoning
outcome: Recently returned disappeared citizens share their traumatic detainment stories at public gatherings. Their testimony ignites outrage and nightly vigils, forcing the Council to open its records and provoking resignations. This deeply human reckoning with the past shatters trust and pushes for accounting and redress.

events.description: Returned disappeared citizens break their silence, giving detailed testimonies of coercion and psychological manipulation during their disappearance.
Vigils and public forums spread across Stenograd as citizens rally in support of the returned and demand real explanations from the Council.
Leaked Council documents confirm secret detainments and BCI-driven targeting policies. Several senior Council members are forced to resign in disgrace.
Crowds gather nightly for candlelit remembrance and impromptu storytelling. Demands for amnesty and reparations grow louder, and official investigations into disappearances are launched.
Mass hearings begin, with victims and Council members facing each other in public. Calls rise for a complete overhaul of BCI and a formal truth commission.
